name: Bravado
description: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric's next two basic attacks within 4 seconds gain  100% total attack speed, each dealing 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage and reducing the  cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second, as well as refreshing Bravado's duration on the first attack.
descriptions: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric's next two basic attacks within 4 seconds gain  100% total attack speed, each dealing 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage and reducing the  cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second, as well as refreshing Bravado's duration on the first attack.

name: Starlight's Touch
description: Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once.  Bravado empowered attacks grant one charge.
descriptions: Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once.  Bravado empowered attacks grant one charge.

Active: Taric  heals himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 (+ 20% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 (+ 100% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.

name: Bastion
description: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and  links to his ally. While linked, the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are replicated on the ally, though the effects do not stack.
levelings: Shield Strength:8 / 9 / 10 / 11 / 12% of target's maximum health
descriptions: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and  links to his ally. While linked, the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are replicated on the ally, though the effects do not stack.
Active: Taric  shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, blessing them with the Bastion link.
Taric can self-cast Bastion to shield himself, or to the nearest unlinked ally in range. Only one champion can be marked at a time, and selecting a new ally clears the previous mark.

name: Dazzle
description: Active: Taric projects a beam of starlight in the target direction, erupting after a 1 second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Taric projects a beam of starlight in the target direction, erupting after a 1 second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

name: Cosmic Radiance
description: Active: Taric calls upon the heavens, summoning a star above him that descends down over 2.5 seconds, afterwards bestowing Taric and all nearby allied  champions with cosmic energy, rendering them  invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Taric calls upon the heavens, summoning a star above him that descends down over 2.5 seconds, afterwards bestowing Taric and all nearby allied  champions with cosmic energy, rendering them  invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
